Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temp rrtd via 133rd Place, 134th Street and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/95th
ShortDescription: 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 103rd, Western, 95th & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 103rd, Western, 95th, then resume their normal route on Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/95th.

Allow extra travel time.
